mapper.select: SELECT m.`MEMBER_ID` as `memberID`, m.`NICKNAME` as `nickname`, m.`PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH` as `profileImagePath`, m.`POINT` as `point`, ct.`IMAGE_PATH` as `characterImagePath` FROM `member` m LEFT JOIN `crow_tit_book` ctb ON m.MEMBER_ID = ctb.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN `crow_tit` ct ON ctb.CROW_TIT_ID = ct.CROW_TIT_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND ctb.IS_MAIN = TRUE;
